data.eml:eml: Kalyptorhynchia (Platyhelminthes: Rhabdocoela) from KwaZulu-Natal (South Africa), with the description of six new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Willems, Wim R., Reygel, Patrick, Steenkiste, Niels Van, Tessens, Bart, Artois, Tom J. (2017): Kalyptorhynchia (Platyhelminthes: Rhabdocoela) from KwaZulu-Natal (South Africa), with the description of six new species. Zootaxa 4242 (3): 441-466, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4242.3.2
